name: Can you get back on the chair?
name_original: Can you get back on the chair?
description: tell us your time in the comments. story is you've fallen and you can get up so   G E T     B A C K     O N     T H E    C H A I R. programmed by GoatCheese. this is DLC for the cancerous troll game i made previously. it uses the same code but modified a little bit.
